lines.text: This is the girl of my dreams, and the job of my dreams! Camp Chipmunk, here I come!
How did you pay for camp? Food stamps?
Hey listen dick-breath, I don't have a rich mommy and daddy to pay for me. I earned my way.
Unless I'm mistaken, this is a wild herb known as 'Angelica Vulgaris'.
So?
Well, the Greeks and Romans believed that certain herbs had medicinal and mystical powers. If I'm right, this plant is supposed to be an aphrodesiac.
How strong is it?
I've heard that it makes spanish fly look like sea salt.

[Nurse Brenda walks into Sarge's office and closes the door]
Hey Sarge...

[Sarge gets up from the couch]
Hello there. I have to say that last night was spectacular... Incredible! I'm getting hot just thinking about it.
I feel the same way. You were just amazing!
You do? I mean, I was? Well, of course you feel that way.
I mean six times in one night is quite an achievement.
That's nothing babe.
Why don't we go for seven!
[Nurse Brenda jumps on Sarge, wrapping her legs around his waist. She starts kissing his neck and lips]
What? Now? Here?
Sure, for starters.
[Sarge looses his balance. He falls on the couch, on top of Nurse Brenda]
Oops.
Oh Sarge! You're just raring to go!
Now, just hold on.
[She unbuttons her blouse]
Do me! Do me! Ride me, you wild stallion! Oh! I want you to fuck me all over this camp.
No! Not here. We can't do it now!
[She unzips his shorts and put her hand down his fly]
Whoa!
Come on, Sarge. Give it to me.
What? Wait, just wait! Someone could come in. Someone could see us.
That's what makes it so hot! I want it now! Oh god, you're getting me all goose pimply. Have a feel.
[She opens her bra]
Oh, oh my!
My tits changed your mind, huh?
Oh Brenda!
[Sits on couch. Brenda sits on his lap, her legs wrapped around his waist]
Oh Sarge, let's christen the whole camp.
[She puts her hand down his shorts]
I'm not in the mood.
That's not the feeling I'm getting.
Look, you have to go. She could walk in on us.
[Brenda gets off Sarge and closes her bra]
Look Brenda, last night was great but we can't do it all over camp. Someone might see us.
[Brenda buttons her blouse and walks to the door]
I'm meeting her tonight. ButI promise, I'll be all set for tomorrow.
No one keeps Brenda waiting! I guess I'll have to take all this sexual energy out on a poor, virginal camper. Too bad. I'm horny enough for the bee costume.
[She exits]
